mapper.sql: MEMBER_ID, USERNAME, NICKNAME, FULLNAME, PHONE, SEX, PHOTO, ACCOUNTBALANCE, WXOPEN_ID, FROMWXOPEN_ID, MEMBERTYPE_ID
mapper.select:
select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.ACCOUNTBALANCE, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id where 1 = 1
and ( m.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.FULLNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.PHONE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and m.MEMBERTYPE_ID = #{pd.MEMBERTYPE_ID}
order by m.MEMBER_ID ASC

select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.ACCOUNTBALANCE, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id where 1 = 1
and ( m.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.FULLNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.PHONE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and m.MEMBERTYPE_ID = #{MEMBERTYPE_ID}
order by m.MEMBER_ID ASC
select MEMBERTYPE_ID, MEMBERTYPENAME from membertype order by MEMBERTYPE_ID asc

select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.ACCOUNTBALANCE, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id where m.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
